newProperties.name: coverPhotoUrl
newProperties.description: Url for Channel's cover (background) photo. Recommended ratio: 16:9.

newProperties.name: isPublic
newProperties.description: Flag signaling whether a channel is public.

newProperties.name: isCensored
newProperties.description: Channel censorship status set by the Curator.

newProperties.name: language
newProperties.description: The primary langauge of the channel's content
